name: Lilly Plays Ball
description:
Lilly Bear-Child is my goldendoodle. The best ever who loves everything life and fresh air. She can sit outside all day and enjoy the wind in her fur. This little game was created to honor her amazing self. 

'I like to stand on my hind legs with my ball in my mouth, Mamma says it's a relic from my days in the circus troop from a past life.'

Unsuspecting hoomans are often shocked by how I manage this.

Click the paw to hear her 'wroof' or click her avatar.

She has the ability to jump extremely high(which is her favorite) and catch the ball.

Click the treat jars to give her a treat, she will like that.
